description: This file defines a React component for a multi-step signup wizard interface, including navigation, progress indication, and form data handling.

methods.name: SignupWizard
methods.description: Main React functional component managing the multi-step signup UI, state, and navigation.

methods.name: nextStep
methods.description: Function to move to the next step in the wizard.

methods.name: prevStep
methods.description: Function to move to the previous step in the wizard.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Function invoked on final step to handle form submission, logging the form data.
